item.description: Dear FA: I believe I have what it takes to rescue the English national football team from the depths of boredom.

item.description: The healthiest pizza in town featuring carrots, celery and beans.

item.title: Greatest Dessert I Have Ever Had
item.description: An unlikely friendship with a pastry-chef and the greatest dessert I’ve ever had.

item.title: Is Post-Quantum Crypto Broken? Frequently and Infrequently Asked Questions
item.description: A paper rocking quantum and cryptography world. What is it all about what does it mean for us? UPDATE: paper was wrong.

item.title: 12 Rules for Life
item.description: Be friendly towards those with rooftops and boats.

item.title: Variations on the 1:2:3 Cookie
item.description: I sincerely believe the essence of a cookie distills down to the 1:2:3 cookie. What happens if you change the proportions?

item.title: Emergence in AI Models: Does Water Really Boil?
item.description: We need to decide what observables and metrics are worth paying attention to.
